I love my laptop because it keeps me connected to the world when I'm on the go.
my husband died a few years ago , so i am raising them alone.
My dogs have been my greatest joy and my biggest challenge.
i like to do all my shopping at walmart.

participant_2.background:
I love learning about the geology of the Grand Canyon and sharing my knowledge with visitors.
i prefer winter.
I'm glad I have my favorite soap to help me feel better.

i like movies based on comedies.

content.text: Hi, how are you?
I'm good! How about you?
Doing ok. I have a lot of work to do but I'm excited to get started.
That sounds great! What kind of work do you do?
I work at Walmart as a cashier. It's not the most glamorous job, but it pays the bills.
That's a good job! I'm glad you're happy with it. I work as a tour guide at the Grand Canyon. I love learning about the geology of the canyon and sharing my knowledge with visitors.
That sounds like a really interesting job! I'm sure you meet a lot of interesting people.
I do! I've met people from all over the world. It's really cool to hear about their different cultures.
I bet! I'm sure you have some great stories to tell.
I do! I could talk about my job for hours.
I'm sure you could! I'm glad you're so passionate about your work.
Thanks! I love my job.
That's great to hear!
Do you have any hobbies outside of work?
I like to go on walks with my dogs, watch movies, and read books.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to go on walks with my dogs too. I also like to play video games and watch movies.
I used to play video games a lot when I was younger, but I don't have as much time for them anymore.
I know what you mean. I used to play video games all the time, but now I only have time to play them on the weekends.
I'm glad you still have time to enjoy them.
Me too! They're a great way to relax and have fun.
I agree! They're a great way to escape from the real world for a while.
That's what I love about them.
Me too.
I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too.
I think we're going to be good friends.
I think so too.
